text.data: Come on!![end]
Okay!! Here's some food!![end]
Okay, okay!![end]
Dragonkeeper: A cute baby was born!! Look!![end]

Dragonkeeper: [character][0x7] is scouting the skies along with the crew!!
He's following the ball of light that came out of the sky.
When he gets back, feed him some daggers as a reward![end]
Dragonkeeper: Rush got on [character][0x2] and is waiting for you!! Are you going for a flight? Scouting the sky is [character][0x7]'s duty.[end]

Dragonkeeper: The dragons... they seem to have hit puberty! They keep growling!! It looks like they're excited that Princess [character][0x1] has returned!!
Okay!! Food!![end]
Dragonkeeper: Well then, will you go? [character][0x4] really loved basking in the thunder.[end]
Dragonkeeper: ...... Just be a little more patient!![end]
Dragonkeeper: I've been waiting for you!! And so have all the dragons!! Hurry!! This way![end]
Will you buy something?[end]
Yes No[end1]
Heehee... I accepted the engagement dentures the armor saleslady gave me... Hee hee hee...[end]
Hee hee hee... Armor saleslady... Oh...!! [character][0x0]!![end]
Do you know about the enemy's floating fortress, Trafalgar?[end]
Please tell me about it. Go shopping[end1]
It's terrifying... This is what it looks like...[end]
Armor saleslady... Our relationship is strictly a professional one... I left that out...[end]
Does my face look like a cucumber? That's what the Mini-Devils told me...[end]
In celebration of Princess [character][0x1]'s return, I've stocked up on some new items!! Would you like to see them?[end]
Mmah... dunchus... aah... [0x28]My dentures are...[0x29][end]
[character][0x9]'s shop is open every day of the year!! Even during rain and heavy wind, come by any time![end]
Welcome!! I'm the weapon salesman!![end]
Go shopping I wanna hear classified secrets.[end1]

Heehee... I really don't want to tell you any, so it's gonna cost you. I'll let you have this one for free, though!! Please listen well!! You already know there are elements in magic, like fire, water and thunder. But, well... based on the element you use to defeat the enemy, the items and weapons you receive will change. If you use fire, you will win fire elemental items...
If you use water, you will win water elemental items...
If you use this knowledge well you can save a lot of money! And you can also gather food for the dragons quicker! Anyway, that's useful information for you to keep in mind.[end]

It's a message from the Mini-Devils.
Monyoo! Manyoo! Munyooo! [0x28]We're Mini-Devils!! When we die we'll die together!![0x29][end]
I was kicked out, even though it's my own shop...[end]
I feel so ashamed... Even at the best of times it's such a small store...[end]
The Mini-Devils were practicing breathing fire... I have a bad feeling about this...[end]
It sure is nice and quiet when the Mini-Devils aren't around.[end]
Be quiet, Mini-Devils... Ah, welcome!![end]
I have a letter from my salesmen colleague for you, [character][0x0].[end]
You got a Letter. Will you read it?[end]
[0x28]Abbreviated...[0x29] To [character][0x0], It's all very sudden, but we got married. From now on we will work very hard together. Wife of the battlefield salesman[end]
Welcome to the item shop!![end]

If the war ends we're going to open up a small shop. Maybe a book shop would be nice... I can have him write books or something. I want to let the people of Orelus know about you, [character][0x0].[end]
We're going to support each other. Okay, do shopping for the peace of Orelus!![end]
The weapon shop man... I don't like him. The nature of his business is military affairs.[end]
Recently Matelite has been coming by to ask things about business. Could he be in love with me...? But... he's a knight and I'm just a shopkeeper...[end]
Umm... about my armor... What do you think of it?[end]
It's not bad. It breaks all the time!! Go shopping[end1]
You're very flattering!![end]
I see... I guess so...[end]
This is the armor shop!! Please buy something...[end]
Uh... No matter where you go, you can't run around naked. So, uh... please buy equipment from my shop.[end]
Monyo monyo... [0x28]If I eat a dragon will it taste good...?[0x29][end]
Monyo monyo!! [0x28]Yay!![0x29][end]
Monyoo!! [0x28]For a human, [character][0x1] is okay!![0x29][end]
Monyoo!! [0x28]Mini-Devils aren't afraid of thunder!![0x29][end]
Monyoo!! [0x28]Study hard and hurry and become like us!![0x29][end]
Manyoo!! [0x28]Even Mini-Devils could win against that girl!![0x29][end]
Manyomanyo!! [0x28]Kick kick!![0x29][end]
Manyomanyo... [0x28]She's quite above average if I do say so myself...[0x29][end]
Manyoo!! [0x28]I want to do this all day...[0x29][end]
Manyoo!! [0x28]Mini-Devils dance, so we don't need weapons or armor!![0x29][end]
Munyoo!! [0x28]If you make them eat Gross Mushrooms they'll act weird!![0x29][end]
Munyoo!! [0x28]Don't pretend to be a kid!![0x29][end]
Munyoo!! [0x28]I'm a Mini-Devil, so I'm not gloomy at all!![0x29][end]

Wagahai: It's okay that they're thieves, but now they can't get out...
Oh, the ambitions of the Mini-Devil Empire...[end]
Wagahai: Ever since the Mini-Devil Revolution these ones have been a real nightmare. No, no, I'm glad I'm being kicked.[end]
Wagahai: What pitiful figures the Mini-Devil soldiers who live in darkness are...[end]

Crew member: Thanks for earlier. As a reward, I will tell you about my dream. Someday, I want to become a dragon. I promised [character][0x7] I would, but will the day when it comes true ever come...?[end]

Crew member: It seems you've helped one of my friends... Hmph!! Go quickly!!
Someday he will become a dragon and return... I get that feeling!![end]
Sajin: This is comfortable. And nobody will find me here...[end]
Sajin: Leave that job to me...[end]
Sajin: You hired us for one person...[end]
Sajin: This profession is dirty... I wash my hands of it... I quit...[end]
Zeroshin: Mom... I'm on a ship now. I can't make any friends... First I must practice my warm greetings.[end]
Zeroshin: Mom... How are you? I can't make any friends... Today I'm practicing smiling by myself.[end]
Zeroshin: Mom... How are you? I'm all alone... I don't talk to Sajin about anything but work. It's so lonely all by myself...[end]

Zeroshin: Mom... I'm coming home soon. I couldn't make any friends...
When the war ends I think I'll just stay in my room even more.[end][end]
